content.html: I think the younger generations are a tad naive to how ugly the world could really be.
content.value: I think the younger generations are a tad naive to how ugly the world could really be.

summary:
I am personally not a fan of guns. But I don’t think mass shootings will stop if firearms are outlawed. You can ask anyone who smoked weed the past few decades while it was illegal; it is/was pretty easy to get.
We need to address this at its root cause. It’s a collapse of the family, community, and society as a whole in the US. We are consumed by materialism and status.
					Continue reading →

content.html: I champion most environmental issues, but once people start saying we can save the world by removing cows they lose all credibility with me. This is poorly researched virtue signaling at best.
content.value: I champion most environmental issues, but once people start saying we can save the world by removing cows they lose all credibility with me. This is poorly researched virtue signaling at best.

content.html:
These people have lost it. Removeing livestock is going to cause more problems than it helps.

content.html:
I think this makes complete sense, I may change my opinion when I get there but at that age you are prolonging the inevitable which is coming fairly soon and if you treat yourself you spend your last days with a much poorer quality of life

Leading US doctor says he won’t get treatment if he gets cancer after 75

content.html: As I surf around twitter and mastodon, I realize it doesn’t help to comment on someones post to get your point across. It’s best to post your own thoughts on your profile and leave comments alone.
content.value: As I surf around twitter and mastodon, I realize it doesn’t help to comment on someones post to get your point across. It’s best to post your own thoughts on your profile and leave comments alone.

content.html: After a little over a decade, I have finished watching the final Episode of The Walking Dead. Finally, I can say I’ve seen it all. Though bloody at times, it has always been my favorite experimental view of humanity and the fight to be a decent human being.
content.value: After a little over a decade, I have finished watching the final Episode of The Walking Dead. Finally, I can say I’ve seen it all. Though bloody at times, it has always been my favorite experimental view of humanity and the fight to be a decent human being.
